name: Case breaching 7 days send Slack Notification to Case Owner and Channel
description: When there is a scheduled object search using SOQL query in Salesforce, do action and other actions

code.name: scheduled_sobject_soql_query
code.title: Scheduled Case search using SOQL
code.description: Scheduled Case search using SOQL query in Salesforce

input.conditions:
="TLMD__c <="  + 7.days.ago.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59.000000+00:00")  +" AND TLMD__c >= " +13.days.ago.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT23:59:59.000000+00:00")+"AND Status = 'Waiting to Close' ORDER BY
TLMD__c DESC"

block.description: Call recipe POST_SLACK_MESSAGE (do not wait for response)
